data.title: Umicore opens solid-state battery material prototyping facility in Olen, Belgium - Automotive Technology Insight
data.meta_description: Developing solid-state batteries involves materials that are extremely sensitive to moisture and therefore require specialized infrastructures, including exceptionally dry air
